SEARCH
Module help
Package help.classes

Class Tickets

java.lang.Object
help.classes.Tickets
public class Tickets extends Object
The Tickets class represents a movie ticket with associated details. This is a singleton class to ensure a single instance of a ticket is used.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tickets

      public Tickets()
      Default constructor initializes the ticket with default values.

    • Tickets

      public Tickets(int sessionId, List<String> seatNumbers, String customerName, double totalSeatCost, double totalProductCost, double totalTax, double totalCost, int discountedSeatNumber)
      Constructs a Tickets object with the specified session details, seat numbers, customer name, and cost breakdown.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session ID for the ticket
      seatNumbers - the list of seat numbers
      customerName - the name of the customer
      totalSeatCost - the total cost of seats
      totalProductCost - the total cost of additional products
      totalTax - the total tax applied
      totalCost - the total overall cost
      discountedSeatNumber - the number of seats with discounts applied

  • Method Details

    • resetInstance

      public static void resetInstance()
      Resets the singleton instance of the Tickets class to its default state. Clears all ticket details and sets the status to null.

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Gets the current status of the ticket.
      Returns:
      the status of the ticket.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String status)
      Sets the status of the ticket. Valid statuses are "ACTIVE" or "CANCELLED". Throws an exception if the status is neither "ACTIVE" nor "CANCELLED".
      Parameters:
      status - the status to set.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the status is neither "ACTIVE" nor "CANCELLED".

    • getInstance

      public static Tickets getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the Tickets class. If no instance exists, it creates a new one.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of Tickets.

    • getDiscountedSeatNumber
